text:
Nick Lashaway (March 24, 1988 – May 8, 2016) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles on "The X-Files", "Girls", and "The 40 Year Old Virgin". He appeared in "The Last Song". He played Brandon O'Neil in "My Soul to Take".
Lashaway died in a car crash on May 8, 2016 in Framingham, Massachusetts, aged 28.
